title: Audio Clip Source
description: A source for audio data referenced in Audio Clips. Audio can be referenced by URI or `bufferView` index. `mimeType` is required.

uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The uri of the audio. Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.

mimeType.description: The audio's MIME type. Used to determine if the client supports the given audio. Unless specified by another extension, the only supported mimeType is audio/mpeg.

bufferView.description: The index of the bufferView that contains the audio data. Use this instead of the image's uri property.
